website_summaries.verdict: The perfect color to add to your collection if you like purple shades, love statement colors, or simply like to occasionally show off your dramatic side.
pros: This deep, mysterious color has hues of purple, pink, blue, and green in its metachromatic finish that has a bit of shimmer
cons: The bold shade may be too dramatic for everyday wear or in some workplace settings

customer_reviews.title: Want nail polish that lasts?
customer_reviews.text: Six days and no chipping or peeling. (The image is when I first painted my nails.) I love the colors. The nail polish dries quickly, even the (oops) super-thich coats I applied on some nails. My nails feel strong. This is awesome nail polish... better than the toluene-laced polish! Note: I buffed my nails before the base coat. Applied the base coat, 2 coats of color, and then the top coat. PS This nail polish, though formaldehyde- and tolene-free still smells like regular polish. I wasn't expecting that. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: MBKW

customer_reviews.title: The color of dirt
customer_reviews.text: This shade was mentioned in an article as being a nice neutral polish. The picture online and the description both sounded nice. When I got it, I tried it and was immediately disappointed. It is a dirty-looking beige. My daughter used it on her toenails and her dad mistook it for dirt. I do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: Zoya Nail Polish
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a toxin free, less chemical nail polish, and order this brand. Not worth. Colors are nice but it made my nails to split, and they became weak! I also ordered their base and top coats! Don’t waste your money , if you want your nails healthy go do research and you will see that there is no good nail polish without any chemicals involved... there is always going to be chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: ElkaB

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Navy Blue color.
customer_reviews.text: This is not Black!!!!! I bought because I thought it was a black pearl color. It is Navy blue!!!! This is a gorgeous Navy blue color...but don't buy it if you think you're buying black! Great wear and stunning color!
customer_reviews.author: Christie B.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute color, and great product!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed this color from my mother-in-law one weekend and HAD to have this color when I got home. The Kelsey is a really cute, summery pink color. Because of the nontoxic ingredients, I feel good about using this on my girls and myself. I received the first bottle shattered in the box in which it arrived, but Amazon chat was easy to reach, and they shipped a new bottle the next day. I love ZOYA.
customer_reviews.author: Karly N Little

customer_reviews.title: Worst Purchase in my Amazon History.
customer_reviews.text: No possible returns due to the product being called flammable. From the pics you can see, the seller doesn't care about the customer quality or this would not have happened. Clearly a storage issue, date issue and lack of care.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Zoya polish is very good. Free of many harmful chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Zoya polish is very good. Free of many harmful chemicals. The color on my scerrn is not the actual color. On screen it has a coral appearance but it is actually a dark pink. Still pretty.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJane59

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: In the sunlight this color looks more coral than pink but inside it looks more pink than coral. Has shimmer but not too much. Very happy with the color. Zoya makes good nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Zoya
customer_reviews.text: I have so many Zoya colors - I love this brand. The polish isn’t very durable, I think that’s because it doesn’t contain formaldehyde and other harsh chemicals (10 Free formula). I can wear for almost a week before I need to touch up or re-polish.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzy Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Streaky
customer_reviews.text: This nail polish looks very streaky going on. Even piling on layers, it still looked streaky. I would not recommend this polish to anyone. Certainly not worth $10. I get better polish for the $1 store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One coat perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always very satisfied with Zoya products. This is a great fall color, looks good on any skin tone goes on smooth, doesn’t chip and it’s one coat perfection
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and long lasting when used with a top coat. I did not love the color but that has nothing to do with the product just my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good color...looks melon. Its the first time I've used the Zoya product. Have purchased another color already Good choice for healthy nails instead of the dipping.
customer_reviews.author: memawrequest

customer_reviews.title: Too liquidly
customer_reviews.text: Too liquidly and not good coverage, it actually looks like is not the real brand. I have bought brand before but I never got so horrible product. The consistency is not thick, it left bubbles and needed several layers. Do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: Michele Karl

customer_reviews.title: different color than expected
customer_reviews.text: don’t buy this if you want purple polish with a blue shift. the packaging gives it that blue color, which to me doesn’t make any sense at all because it’s nail polish, what you see on the outside should be what you see on your nails.. no need to spruce up the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: nzalu

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color, and the polish (thanks to another brand's sturdy top coat) hasn't chipped in 3 days of normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This color does not have the iridescent color like the photo. It is just purple. Sadly I have the same color named differently.
customer_reviews.author: dohpaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nail polish
customer_reviews.text: This has lasting power and is safer than the other brands. I really like it and am thinking of buying a few for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: BeachDogKC

customer_reviews.title: Great nail polish color
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fall and winter color. I just love it. Good price, nicely wrapped and received right on time.
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: Good polish, 2 coats and dried easily
customer_reviews.text: It is very purple- I wish the blue shimmer showed through better, but all in all the polish is really great. If you like a good purple with a shimmer, this is the polish for you. Coats easily and wears great.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Willocks

customer_reviews.title: Way darker and not highlighted as color dot shows
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little more intense than I expected. The highlights are not exactly what the color dot shows. It sort of looks like something for people with really dark tans.
customer_reviews.author: nancy strickland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nail polish, great color
customer_reviews.text: Isadora is a perfect color for skin with blue undertones. The nail polish goes on easily and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Sue

customer_reviews.title: love the color
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, nice and bright for summer, wears well.
customer_reviews.author: likes to shop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color but no blue hue to it, still, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Lasts and lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find a less toxic/more sustainable nail polish that performs well and has staying power. Two weeks and no chips!
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: cute color!
customer_reviews.text: i love this color! it’s not super pink, but more of a mauve - which is exactly what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Angie C.

customer_reviews.title: Thick. No color shift.
customer_reviews.text: No shift. Thick. I have used several Zoya before, not sure what went wrong but it was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Solid coverage; tint of berry (pink) undertone
customer_reviews.text: A single coat gave good coverage. The red runs more towards a berry than a fire engine red but very attractive on some skin tones.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shade of red!
customer_reviews.text: Best shade and application ability. Classic and beautiful. Expensive looking!
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Needs more than one coat but nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, much lighter than the picture. Doesn’t dry fast enough from my openion.
customer_reviews.author: NJ-MÖMMĒR

customer_reviews.title: Unreturnable wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Totally wrong color. Also ineligible for return. It's actually a shimmery grey/silver
customer_reviews.author: Virginia P.

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, came fast, looks to be authentic but much cheaper than buying in stores
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, but the color did not cover well and needed 3 coats.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: This is lacquer polish not gel.
customer_reviews.text: I could not use it because it was the wrong type of polish. It came up when I queried 'gel nail polish' and $10 I didn't check but when I got the product and found it to be lacquer I reviewed the description and there's no indication of the type of polish it is.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The actual color is super light. You’ll need 4/5 coats to achieve the color shown here.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!!
customer_reviews.text: This polish is really long lasting & the color is beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: lhernandez19

customer_reviews.title: Great polish
customer_reviews.text: I love this shade of purple. The color was intense with lots of shine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chuana R Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fallon is a pretty & shiney dark pink. Good quality polish.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly but seems like it’s not authentic zoya
customer_reviews.text: This product does not seem to be authentic and the color is more navy than electric or cobalt blue.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shade
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! It’s perfect for summer and makes you look super tan
customer_reviews.author: BrianaG

customer_reviews.title: Arrived late, but...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 3 days late despite being ordered on Amazon Prime, but good quality otherwise. Doesn’t stink to high heaven like other nail polishes & is a very nice color
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty purple but definitely not color changing hues like it says in the description. Just a metallic purple
customer_reviews.author: StonedasMedusa

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: When you follow their process, from step 1 on, the manicure lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Zoya wins again
customer_reviews.text: incredibly long wearing and the perfect red for my skin tone. This one (MING) has a little more yellow, not too purple. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: GenuineImitation

customer_reviews.title: Great product very 😃
customer_reviews.text: Color exactly what was advertised. Ups perfect delivery. Good job.Ty.
customer_reviews.author: bubba

product_meta.title: ZOYA Nail Polish
product_meta.description:
Color:DelaneyA royal metachromatic (pewter, blue, purple, green) metallic flip.

BRAND STORY
Founded in 1986, Zoya focuses on high quality products for professional salons and spas. Zoya Nail Polish was the first to create a Big 3 free formula, placing an emphasis on the health and well-being of their clients.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
